version_description: In this update we’ve made things better with a few more bug fixes.

In this update we’ve made things better with a few crash fixes.
In this update we’ve made things better with a few changes.
In this update we’ve made things better with a few bug fixes.
In this version we've included some changes for deep linking, as well as further bug fixes and improvements to stability.
In this update we’ve made things better with a few changes.
Stability release for upcoming new features.
In this update we’ve improved our homepage with dynamic content.
Bug fixes
Support for upcoming new Order Tracking feature.
Stability release for upcoming new features.
Performance improvements for upcoming features.
Performance improvements for upcoming features.
Performance improvements for upcoming features.
Bug fixes

nextpay account holders can now purchase items in Next stores with a quick tap of their phone!
If you have a nextpay account, our new update gives you access to a digital version of your nextpay card, letting you pay for items in our stores with a simple scan of a unique QR code.
Performance improvements for upcoming features.

Select users can now use Live Chat to speak directly to one of our customer service advisors directly in the Next app.
Update your app now to chat to our advisors who can help you track your order, find an item, amend or cancel an order, and more…
The latest version contains bug fixes and performance updates.
We’ve added our sizing guides to the app to ensure you always find your perfect fit.
The latest version contains bug fixes and performance updates.

Vertical Spreads
• Our spreads have gone vertical! Now you can scroll your way through your favourite products with ease.
Bug fixes and stability
The latest version contains bug fixes and performance updates.
The latest version contains bug fixes and performance updates.
We’ve now released a version of our app for Japan and Germany so you can view in your local language.
Looking for an unforgettable gift with a personal touch for your special someone? Our Personalised Gift collection is now at your fingertips, browse and purchase via the Next app.
The latest version contains bug fixes and performance updates.

• アプリを更新によって、製品ページの読み込みが一段と速くなりました。
• 新しい検索フィルターで、在庫がある商品を探せるようになりました。

We've made some updates to our app to make your shopping experience even better!

• We've updated our app so product pages now load even faster.
• You can now find items that are back in stock with our new search filter.

This app update contains some general behind the scenes maintenance and housekeeping to keep our app running smoothly. We’ve also made a few small tweaks. We’ll have some great new features coming soon so be sure to keep your app up to date for the best shopping experience.

In this app update, we’ve added a new way for you to use our search function. You can now quickly navigate our departments and categories in a menu-style format with a fresh new look. 

We’ve also made a few styling tweaks, fixed some gremlins and completed some under-the-bonnet maintenance to prepare for more new features (coming soon).
Be sure to keep your app up-to-date for the best shopping experience.

Let’s get you up to speed. In this update, we’ve done some tinkering to enhance the app's performance (it's very technical, we won't bore you), which reduces it's loading time. This means there's less time waiting for your app to load and more time for scrolling the latest fashion, home and brands at Next.

A whole new look. You may notice the app looks a little different, that’s because in our latest update we’ve given our filter feature a makeover. Now it’s even easier to specify your search and find exactly what you’re looking for. Why not try it out?

Updating the look and feel of the current quick filters that appear on the PDP that helps customers narrow down their search results with easy access to filters without having to move away from the PDP

Be sure to keep your app up-to-date for the best shopping experience.

Quick as a click. This update has improved the pace and performance of the app which means you can shop at speed.
